channel.title: Busted by the cops for anything at all
channel.description:
Hve you guys ever been busted for other then shit like drugs? What about svchool suspensions and all that lol..
One time me and my friends went to a mall amed Pacific mall...theres tight security and theres liek bootleg stuff everywhere...like burned cd's, burned games... movies that are still in theters on dvd ect...
So we are chillin in this mall..which btw is fully chinese...theres me wali,waris,sohail, and fahad...we go around grabin shit like rings and watches and all...then we go into a store and sohail buys a dogtag and gets it engraved and all...so next we go in a store and theres one lady..i tell sohail go distract her..so he goes and asks her a few questions and one fo my friends pockets a necklace..the lady comes over and she's like there was just a necklace here ..where is it..and we are all like we dont know..so she calls security and there like wheres the necklace...so they like take us down and search us and thy find like 400 dollors of stuff in all our pockets..call the cops....call our parents...then this cop was like talking to us before our parents came...and I was like mouthing off to him so I got put in cufs..lol no joke..but after a while he like "you ready to get out of those" im like yea lol..so our parents come and take us home..

item.title: Busted by the cops for anything at all
item.dc:creator: @IheartMaryJane IheartMaryJane
item.description:
@IheartMaryJane wrote:

how about this shit. i was just charged with simple possession of marijuana (0.6 grams) and possession of drug paraphernalia( my black bowl) at school.

my story starts on a friday before school, my parents had just left at 5:30 to go to the nascar race and i was home alone. i got a shower and packed me up a nice bowl. smoked it and was feeling pretty straight. ate some poptarts and smoked me another bowl. at 6:15 i packed my bowl lighter weed and what not up to go to school,along with 2 poptarts. i got to my busstop which is surround by houses since i live in a neighboorhood and i could barely stand in place. i was falling over and shit. the bus finally came and i got on with joy. this was by far the most exciting bus ride ever. after getting to my seat at the back of the bus i pulled out my psp and took out the headphones and played the song midnight train by journey. by this time i was super stoned and was laughing out loud on my bus. this continued for almost an hour until we arrived at school. while sitting on the bus waiting for the bell i packed me up another one, yes right there on the bus. the bell rung and i raced to find my friend kyle. i told him what i had and he was like c’mon get in my car and lets go. so i got in his car in which we smoked another bowl. well i went the whole day fine and then at the end of the day on the bus ride home i took a couple resin hits on the bus. the following monday i returned to school with my bowl and my friend hooked me up with some bud. in 2nd block the ass.principal came in and took me to his office.there i was searched and was charged with simple possession of marijuana and possession of drug paraphernalia. my mom was uber pissed and what not and now im grounded on probation have to take mandatory drug tests go to court and all this shit but yeh i took a drug test and fucking passed it was amazing i dont know how i did it but if someone has an explanation on how after 2 days of getting completely baked i passed a drug test let me know

Read full topic
item.source: Busted by the cops for anything at all

item.title: Busted by the cops for anything at all

item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Yeh, I did, for a vaild reason. Within a week, everything worked out. I never expected it too, but it did.

Read full topic

item.title: Busted by the cops for anything at all
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I’m cool so I’m gonna say I got in to a fight of super ninjas who all had guns. I got out my knife and I was like “knife, l0l?”. They said “Ok”. We were dancing around a bit taking desperate stabs at eachother. I then pulled out my knife and went “lol” and shot. I then said to their corpses “lol, owned pl0x?”.

Some old lady was watching and called the cops. I made a run for it before they came. I really needed a piss so I went down an alley to have one. Anyway, the cops pulled up and I was like “oh shitz0rs.” I did my zip up and got done in for Public Urination.

Read full topic
item.source: Busted by the cops for anything at all

item.title: Busted by the cops for anything at all
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I’m just curious, mostly.

Why did the cops chase you?
How did you get away?
After 30 odd escapes you’d think they would recognize your bike?

…

Read full topic
item.source: Busted by the cops for anything at all

item.title: Busted by the cops for anything at all
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]Out of the like 30 time sI’ve been chased on Motorbike out in the bush, only ever been caught like 3 times.

The word like means you’re uncertain. Are you uncertain of the exact number? Uncertain that anything like this ever happened?[/quote]
Lol, I can’t remember, I ride like every weekend, sometimes out in the bush with my Dad.m You do the maths, 5 years of riding + Nearly every weekend (deppending other stuff) And you tell em you can remember that all of the back of your head. Especiialy when I ahve other thigns to worry about.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @arraness14 arraness14
item.description:
@arraness14 wrote:

[quote=“anon95490785, post:2, topic:17953”][quote author=arraness14 link=topic=26827.msg309146#msg309146 date=1160667716]

Never busted, suspended twice from school(swearing at teachers) and chased by cops a few times(usually involving drugs or alcohol).

Strange names arraness, where are you from?

lol…its not my real name…in my initials sounded out…R and S ARR® AN(AND) ESS(S)
[/quote]

I meant your friends names and stuff, but anyways I read in another thread that your also from Ontario… So I assume Toronto or somewhere near by, because thats really the only area with arabians, asians, etc…[/quote]

yeah im n toronto…but there indian so ya…

item.title: Busted by the cops for anything at all
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Meh, was really high and went out lockerboxing with a bunch of friends. One thing led to another and one kid had a concussion and we got in a little bit of trouble. Oh well, they didn't know we were high so it wasnt a big deal.

Just remember the next time, slap the kid with the concussion. He’ll be fine.

item.title: Busted by the cops for anything at all
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

so many times, to the point my mum kept a box from when i was still at school. Only thing is the box is full of school letters home, reports, letters from the bus company, letters from the train company. Funilly enough my only police run in was to do with the bus company.

Damn record keeping, she still shows them to people.

Read full topic
